name: Popgoes: Silent Night
summary: The Silent Night would take place during the Christmas Day, 25th December 2024. After Fritz Glade died and "The London Bridge" was destroyed, Mike Schmidt Jr. was left at the edge of his sanity. The final night would take place in a strange, psychedelic version of The Popgoes Pizzeria, where Mike would have to fight Grave Stone, the representation of the broken connection between Fritz and Mike and embodiment of death. The goal of Mike is to kill himself before Grave Stone manages to do it.
